brief_title: Effects of Aripiprazole in Overweight Patients Treated With Olanzapine for Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder
brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to compare the affects of aripiprazole and olanzapine on weight change.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Adult patients diagnosed with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder who are currently taking olanzapine.
